tools.name: find_code
tools.description: Find relevant code in your codebase using semantic search with AI-powered intent detection. Returns precisely targeted code snippets based on natural language queries, reducing context bloat by 60-80%. Supports 170+ programming languages with intelligent chunking and multi-provider embeddings.

arguments.name: query
arguments.description: Natural language search query describing what code you're looking for (e.g., 'authentication logic', 'error handling for API calls')

arguments.name: intent
arguments.description: Optional search intent: 'understand', 'debug', 'implement', 'refactor', 'document', 'test', or 'review'. Auto-detected if not provided.

arguments.name: token_limit
arguments.description: Maximum tokens to return in results (default: 30000, range: 1000-100000)

arguments.name: focus_languages
arguments.description: Optional array of programming languages to filter results (e.g., ['Python', 'JavaScript']). Supports 170+ languages.

arguments.name: max_results
arguments.description: Maximum number of code matches to return (default: 30, range: 1-100)

arguments.name: include_tests
arguments.description: Whether to include test files in search results (default: false)
